trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ422_02745_SEQ_00<tab>Gyoei of Yuzuka Manor is looking for an adventurer with the constitution to see his deed done.
TEXT_STMBDZ422_02745_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the magatsu koja and defeat any enemies that appear.
TEXT_STMBDZ422_02745_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the muddy purse to Gyoei.
TEXT_STMBDZ422_02745_GYOEI_000_000<tab>You're the strongest-looking adventurer I've seen all day! Very sturdy, very solid. I've a deed I'd like to ask of you.

TEXT_STMBDZ422_02745_GYOEI_000_001<tab>Allow me to explain. Some days past, I was walking near the large gate just behind our manor, here. Well, you can imagine my surprise when I came under attack by a massive koja, big and round as a goobbue's belly! I escaped without injury, but the cursed thing made off with my coinpurse.

TEXT_STMBDZ422_02745_GYOEI_000_002<tab>Those contestable koja are always making life hard for us Namazu. Could you go and have words with them? I know of no other way to retrieve my coinpurse. And if they won't return it, you have my leave to be as rough as you like!

TEXT_STMBDZ422_02745_GYOEI_000_003<tab>Could you go and have words with those contestable koja? I know of no other way to retrieve my coinpurse. And if they won't return it, you have my leave to be as rough as you like!
TEXT_STMBDZ422_02745_SYSTEM_000_012<tab>The magatsu koja casts his gaze toward the One River. Perhaps what you seek lies in that direction.
TEXT_STMBDZ422_02745_GYOEI_100_020<tab>Did you punish those koja for what they did? Chastise them, beat them?
TEXT_STMBDZ422_02745_GYOEI_000_020<tab>Well, thank you for that. And you got my coinpurse back! I had nearly given up hope.
TEXT_STMBDZ422_02745_GYOEI_000_021<tab>I pray your words serve to calm them for a spell. We Namazu cannot suffer much more harassment at their...heads.

TEXT_STMBDZ422_02745_GYOEI_000_022<tab>This gil did not come easy. It was born of my labor. Of my sweat and tears. I worked hard, picking flowers. Soaking them and flavoring them. I sell and serve them to the people here, and all who buy them sing their praises. I am grateful for what you did this day.
